#summary Known-working AutoTools for building.

= Introduction =

One thing that always annoys me about Squid development is the weird and wonderful combination of automake/autoconf/system which will generate a correct build environment.

This document will attempt to capture known working automake/autoconf environments.

= Details =

== FreeBSD-7-STABLE ===

This is what I'm currently developing on.

Port versions:

* autoconf-2.61_2
* automake-1.9.6_2

Dependencies (that I think are relevant):

* m4-1.4.9,1
